descriptionHtml:
Hi There,

This one is a littel more functional than my \'Cleric Armour\' so should keep the more modest amougst you happy :)

This adds a slightly heavier mantle to the Thieves Guild Master armour. Albeit functionally this would probably make it a lot harder to stealth, but then... if your a master...

Although i really liked the original armour, i thought the whole shoulder area looked a bit awkward. Also my \'rouge\' character if a bit more of a fighter than a sneaker so i thought I\'d add some armour.

This mod now has options to replace the male and female Thieves Guild Master Armour. Its doesnt change any stats etc and uses duplicate textures so it doesnt effect anything else in game. It will only clash with other mods that edit this armour.

The male and female armours are seperate and do not share any resrouces. As such you can decide to install the male, or female, or both at your own conveniance. ;)

install

Extract the textures and meshes folders into your data folder

Bugs etc

As ever, there is a little clipping, although nothing major. If you see any major glitches I\'ve missed, let me know.

-- Comments, Feedback, Endoresments

Dont forget to let me know what you think, post screenshots and endorse. Its for all of those reasons I upload this stuff rather than just use it myself :) Also, lots of you have some very good ideas !

Hope you like it,

All the best

Dae

--Permissions--
Feel free to do what you will with this, however, it\'d be nice if you add me to your credits ;)
author: Dae
